thread.title: Aiste Siniakovaite

author: Aiste Siniakovaite
title: Aiste Siniakovaite
text: I enjoyed completing my teaching assistant level 2 course and it's great that support is available 24/7! I used support quite a few times and I had quick responses and very polite and helpful advisers. I had technical problems with my computer but when I rang the number, the adviser gave me very clear instructions of what I should do and I haven't had any problems since. I would recommend e-careers to anyone who want to expand their knowledge and gain great learning experience.
